FuncDef: The display pki sm2 local-key-pair public command displays information about SM2 key pairs and public keys. The display pki sm2 local-key-pair public command displays information about SM2 key pairs and public keys.
CLIs: display pki sm2 local-key-pair [ name <key-name> ] public

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the SM2 key pair that you want to view. If this parameter is not specified, information about all SM2 keys and public keys is displayed. If this parameter is specified, information about only the specified SM2 key and public key is displayed.
The value must be an existing SM2 key pair name.
